trip verified pretty good flight but still some small thing that can be improved check in wa quick lounge wa good tasty food and well chosen wine disappointingly they had not secured a gate so we had to bus to the aircraft and it wa all a hot scrum i got the last bus to avoid the crush emirate turkish lufthansa qatar all had plane on gate why not ba pennypinching then it turned out the cabin crew forgot about those on the last bus so i had to ask for a welcome drink it came and the champagne wa actually cold well done ba first time they managed to serve champagne cold in my 10 year of flying with them big improvement cabin and seat were lovely a always i greatly prefer to the emirate whitegold bling drink service wa prompt ife wa good starter trout wa ok main chicken wa excellent cheese wa sold not cold a it should be wine were excellent we were not disturbed through the night so got a good sleep on a comfy bed cabin wa a bit too warm though for my personal preference wa woken up a asked and served a tasty breakfast small detail a it is impossible to get water to 100c at altitude maybe ba could warm the ceramic coffee cup so coffee retains it heat a bit longer pouring not quite hot coffee into a nice but cold china mug mean it is lukewarm instantly off the plane in record time 2 minute after parking bag were waiting for u on the belt excellent work by the ground staff overall 810 improvement point gate not bus to the plane dont forget passenger on the last bus or who board late but well before pushback standout cabin crew member wa miguel what a star

trip verified i decided to treat myself and my teenage daughter to world traveller plus on the return leg of our canada holiday paying hundred of pound extra to do so only to end up spending nine and a half hour trapped in a broken seat staring at a blank screen after both our entertainment system failed to work i hadnt bought a book or uploaded a film because i had assumed i would be enjoying the entertainment ba had promised so i decided to lie back and get some rest instead only to discover that the leg rest on my seat didnt work the flight attendant wa able to prop it up manually by shoving thing underneath but unfortunately this only made matter worse because it became firmly stuck in the up position forcing my body into an awkward position during the descent when i had to keep my seatback upright leaving me with back pain that lasted three day i have a bad lower back early on in this experience i asked to be moved to economy so that i could sit normally and watch a film but the flight wa full and there wa no space the apologetic flight attendant assured me i would receive compensation which i assumed meant the airline would at the very least upgrade u the next time we flew ba since we had been unable to enjoy any of the advertised benefit of world traveller plus the two of u only had one suitcase each so hadnt made use of the extra baggage allowance ba actual compensation offer 25 worth of avios point each i wrote back since ba doesnt allow you to have any direct telephone contact with their complaint department explaining firmly but politely that this wa not fair or acceptable given the hundred of extra pound id paid for added extra the airline had failed to deliver they then ghosted me my experience is a cautionary tale about british airway customer support if all go to plan you may well have a very pleasant world traveller plus experience but if anything should go wrong support staff will wash their hand of you and your money will have been wasted so unless youre prepared to gamble i would advise you to either stick with economyworld traveller since then youre only really paying to fly from a to b which they do manage to do or fly with another airline or you could end up like me throwing away extra money on an experience that fell far below the standard of economy class if your flight is to canada i would recommend an airline such a air canada which i turned to during the uncertainty of the covid pandemic because of their exceptional customer service and fast nononsense refund they do cost a bit more so when life returned to normal postcovid i started flying ba again believing such high standard of customer service were no longer important i now see that this wa both a mistake and a false economy one that ha ended up costing me hundred of wasted pound

trip verified ive flown with many airline but my recent experience with british airway left much to be desired the inflight entertainment wa underwhelming and i wa disappointed by the lack of basic amenity such a a comfort kit with essential like eye mask while the only positive aspect wa the slightly more generous legroom overall i found the service to be far below expectation not impressed

trip verified i recently flew from new york back to london with ba this wasnt my first long haul with them however it wa my first time travelling in world traveler plus we boarded the aircraft on time and stress free and my first impression wa good the cabin wa clean and the leg room wa good the recline on the seat wa generous and combined with a footrest it wa quite comfortable waiting on our seat wa a decent quality cushion and blanket a well a an amenity kit the amenity kit contained some good headphone sock an eye mask lip balm pen and toothbrush and toothpaste once boarding wa complete we were offered a pre departure drink with orange juice water or champagne being the option the crew were all very friendly and professional and did their upmost to ensure that everyone wa happy once in the air we were offered a hot towel and another round of drink this time with a lot more selection drink were offered several time throughout the flight a menu wa also handed out not long after take off the starter wa quinoa and for main there wa a choice of chicken meatball and pasta or a vegetarian mushroom dish i chose the meatball and they were really good my only real complaint about the flight wa people not getting the dish they wished for we were sat in the last row of the premium economy cabin and by the time the meal service got to u all of the chicken dish were gone the moral of the story is that if you sit at the front of the cabin you will likely get your preferred meal option after the meal i chose to watch some show on the well sized entertainment screen ba is definitely up there for best inflight entertainment finally about an hour before landing we were served a breakfast snack this come in the form of a warm egg and swiss cheese bagel it wa edible but also a little soggy and didnt really taste of much i certainly wont be craving one anytime soon we touched down into heathrow on time before disembarking the aircraft and picking up our bag everything wa very efficient and we were on our way in no time

trip verified an excellent flight despite this being a 45 hour flight in a a320 that is configured for short hop to edinburgh or glasgow and despite there being no ife i ended up really enjoying the flight i dont know if it wa just that i had really low expectation but i thought the crew were fabulous and the food and wine wa surprisingly good the plane itself looked very new and wa in perfect condition from the very start i really liked the crew they were all cheerful genuine and clearly enjoying their work i noticed they constantly had friendly and proactive interaction with passenger and when the food and drink came around they were generous with the wine and happily provided topups later in the flight the food box wa deceptively small it actually contained a decent selection of food and wa more than enough to keep me feeling satisfied on this trip there were regular and detailed update from the cockpit which i also appreciated so whilst the hard product on this flight were limited it wa the service and the genuine enjoyment of the crew that won me over

trip verified this is a route i fly regularly used first class security and lounge all good lounge surprisingly not so busy wa great to see we werent departing from the dreaded a10 bus gate and the flight wa on time boarded and ready to go on time and then six passenger were a no show a 50 minute delay to offload the bag and depart longer than the actual flight itself there ha to be a better process for fast tracking this hence finally arrived in paris 45 min late on the plus side the cabin crew were great and even had a personal welcome from the inflight manager which happens le and le these day

trip verified while ba may have made some positive improvement to it club world product it world traveler product and catering leaf much to be desired the first meal service wa very slow more than 3 hour to serve the meal the portion were incredibly small the chicken dish contained maybe 5 piece of chicken 2 piece of broccoli and a piece of unknown food small snack were available during the flight but the real let down wa the snack before landing in vancouver it wa a bizarre tasting chicken pastry wrap which didnt have much chicken and did not taste at all like a pastry it wa too sweet too mushy and too salty the seat although not exactly spacious were tolerable although the aisle are very narrow and cabin crew and other passenger frequently bumped into me while walking up and down the aisle cabin crew were generally responsive to passenger request and once or twice during the flight came down the aisle with drink however the poor level of catering made for a very frustrating trip i certainly can not recommend ba

trip verified british airway new club suite is a marked improvement from their older club world seat the new club suite offer a fair amount of privacy especially with the screen door closed and includes direct aisle access when fully reclined the seat convert into a fairly spacious bed although i found the surface on the side a bit hard and uncomfortable to sleep on the catering on board wa fairly good and tasty the appetizer and the main course were generally well cooked although the cabin crew were very slow with the meal service it took almost 3 hour after departure from vancouver for the meal service to be completed prior to arrival a light breakfast wa served which contained a croissant a small egg and bacon sandwich and a mango puree ba catering on this flight wa generally good unfortunately upon arrival at heathrow passenger had to wait over 90 minute for checked baggage to arrive no explanation wa given and not a single member of ground staff came to assist passenger or provide any information about when checked baggage would arrive this wa a very frustrating end to what wa otherwise a fairly enjoyable trip in club world and left a very poor last impression of ba

trip verified i am surprised to be able to give a favourable review of the flight european business class is typically 3x3 seating with the middle seat on each group of three left empty leg room is never generous and ba is at the bottom of the generous barrel in this respect however on this occasion at least and a the flight is one hour that wa not an issue cabin crew were great very professional and efficient cabin wa clean and aircraft seemed pretty up to date i wa surprised to find that business class wa served an afternoon tea complete with champagne much nicer than the poor prosecco in the lounge we had three small sandwich chocolate cake and a choice of plain or fruit scone strawberry jam and clotted cream on the side for those who wanted them it all tasted great i didnt try the chocolate cake and there wa just about enough time to eat it before landing the crew worked very hard to complete service in time so well done them

trip verified i should like to review my flight with british airway from hannover to london heathrow firstly the website wa very easy to use however i object to the policy put in place with regard to having to pay for preferred seating checkingin online wa a very easy process other than being presented with the fee to select a seat at the boarding gate in hannover the staff were superb they insisted that people with larger bag turned over the bag for checkin i wa included in this the staff were very fair and polite and imposed this policy evenly and in a firm but polite manner the flight took off reasonably ontime the cabin crew were very good and coped really well with what wa an entirely full flight the now usual small bottle of water and a tiny snack the size of a uk 50p coin were issued to the passenger on this flight the captain wa very vocal in the nicest possible way he oozed a sense of professionalism and wa well spoken with clear and informative announcement disembarkation wa orderly however the cabin crew were nowhere to be seen when leaving the aircraft given that this wa a very short flight and given the full nature of the flight too the cabin crew deserve an applause for their professionalism this experience ha turned around my le than positive experience with this airline a few month ago well done to the ground staff and cabin crew for making this a pleasant and civilized journey

trip verified very impressed with ba check in online wa a little convoluted but once through that everything wa great we flew in standard economy and paid to choose our seat this seems to be standard for all airline now and how they keep initial price down but worth doing so we could sit together meal were excellent and drink great a simple water and biscuit on our short internal leg but still included and then 1 drink 1 main meal and 1 snack on our 7 hour leg wa better than our last trip on emirate they gave out double drink at drink service that wa 2 coke and 2 beer for my partner and he wa well pleased staff friendly bag transfered and arrived in good condition and entertainment on route wa good too will definitely choose ba again over other airline

trip verified lhr sfo la lgw august 2023 in club world it a shame that the british airway experience is split into a mixture of fantastic ground and cabin crew and dated product and dreadful after service our flight to san francisco wa on an a380 the interior of which wa showing it age two of our 3 seat had issue 1 would not recline the dividing screen to the next seat would not stay up and the other wa temperamental with it recline and the ife would not respond to the control crew on board were great but the dated and aging product for which top dollar is charged for should have been upgraded year ago a shame for such a great aircraft coming back from la vega to lgw on an tired 777 we were informed at check in that there wa an issue with the seat we had prebooked and paid for and that we would need to be moved seat we were moved to were fine and worked the original seat had people in them and they appeared fine flight wa late landing and departing due to weather condition in vega but the aircraft wa turned round in a super quick time which wa impressive where ba have really let themselves down is the after flight experience after 3 12 month we got an acknowledgement and avios credit for the issue on the flight to sfo we are still waiting 9 month later for the avios point we used to pay for the seat selection to be refunded for the la vega to london gatwick leg of the flight despite numerous attempt to contact they havent got back to u our avios account page through ba wont load our recent transaction and doe not list the flight weve taken in the last 12 month wont be travelling with ba for a long long time now dated and poorly maintained on board product and appalling customer service

trip verified i flew with british airway from heathrow to hannover although the checkin process wa relatively quick there wa a noticeable lack of staffanother apparent costcutting measure by ba upon arriving in hannover i found that my luggage hadnt made it to the airport and there were no staff to assist i had to file a report online the following day i received a call saying my luggage would arrive on a later flight but this didnt help me since german shop are closed on sunday leaving me without essential item a a result i wa confined to my hotel unable to attend any planned event because i didnt have suitable clothing when my luggage eventually reached the hannover airport i got a call from ba informing me that they couldnt deliver it for another day or two they advised me to take a taxi to pick it up and said i could claim back the cost but when i submitted my claim ba refused to cover the taxi expense they also declined to offer compensation for the inconvenience caused by the delayed baggage even though it disrupted a full day of my trip service on my return flight from frankfurt wa also below par from the ground crew at frankfurt airport who were slow rude at check in ba customer service ha declined significantly now resembling the level of budget airline like easyjet and ryanairbut at a premium price given my recent experience i will avoid flying with ba whenever possible

trip verified very inconsiderate pa announcement were made by a purser who appearingly decided to exchange his career at ba for comedy club acting although not at the right setting first prelanding pa my colleague and i had a very long week with british airway so we are dimming the light a we dont want you to see our face if you are afraid of the dark just look at the passenger next to you although clearly not the purser intent it sounded like a mocking and very careless of people with aero darkness phobia who may have a panic attack after such a joke very inconsiderate and damage ba brand a a safe accessible and a trusted airline second pa after landing wa if youd like to make a complaint go call easyjet i felt genuinely insulted by this joke ba charged an abusive fee in the end i literally had to beg the rude and dismissive ground staff in madrid not to check my roller bag at gate because i recently had surgery and needed to hold onto it to walk instant noodle which i purchased onboard were barely edible all cabin crew except from one disappeared at the galley where they were loudly chatting and laughing and looked at me a a nuisance even when i just wanted to pas through them to visit the lavatory and then the chief purser effectively announces that if anyone is unhappy they can go fly someone else wake up ba you are already worse than easyjet and ryanair in term of value for money i note that only one who found the purser joke funny were the other cabin crew who made a few vulgar laugh while passenger remained dead silent i can understand airline scaling back service to cut cost i will never understand how you can allow your staff to openly mock and insult your passenger i am a ba silver member and have been a loyal ba customer for year a disgrace

trip verified this is the first time i have seen the new club world suite the seat wa comfortable but unlike other airline ba ha crammed a many seat in business class a is humanly possible so the cabin felt cramped the crew behaved a though we the passenger should have been grateful for them turning up for their shift they looked scruffy in the new uniform clearly the dress code policy ha been scrapped i appreciate that appearance is no measure of service quality in the uk alone but the service wa appalling the menu lacked choice and the food wa presented a if it fell to the floor and wa scooped back onto the plate the bedding wa atrocious an old scraggly blanket and ill fitting seat cover i wa cold and asked for an extra blanket which never arrived there were no drink coaster obviously cutback so my drink kept spilling i decided to clean up myself a the crew couldnt be bothered and didnt pick up on the fact i wa using bathroom hand towel to act a drink coaster to mop up the mess the aircraft wa old although retrofitted and had a leak by the galley wall with lot of blue roll in situ to mop up the mess not at all a premium service this felt more like a low cost carrier doing business

trip verified flew business class from doha to london on 31st march the service wa slow and unfriendly even one of the male cabin crew working in business class asked the female cabin crew who wa looking after the area where i wa in to smile i ordered waffle for breakfast and they looked like theyd fallen off the plate and had been thrown back on see photo the plate that the waffle were served on wa so hot that when i moved the plate i burnt my finger i wasnt warned that it wa ferociously hot i wa shocked at how bad the food presentation wa but didnt feel comfortable saying anything to the cabin crew a she wasnt approachable or friendly for lunch the bread roll wa so dry and rock hard that i couldnt cut through the end not sure why the food and service wa so bad on this flight a generally ba food is good and is well presented also the wifi wasnt working on the flight

trip verified starting off at heathrow terminal 3 check in wa fairly easy but fast track security wa terrible the area is currently under refurbishment but there are only two scanning machine in the fast track area and at this time only one wa in use so the queue wa long and very slow moving ive heard mixed thing about the ba club lounge but i wa fairly impressed food option were fairly varied and tasted really nice nice salad a well a pie and veg drink a always in ba lounge are very easy to lay your hand on and cater for most want lounge wa a decent size with various seating option and wasnt very busy at the time i went sunday evening boarding wa well organised and club passenger higher tier wa boarded quickly and easily amenity kit bottle of water and bedding were waiting at the seat welcome drink were provided fairly quickly after sitting down hot towel provided after take off shortly followed by drink and nut a ha been regularly said these nut would be infinitely better if served properly not in a very small packet food service on board consisted of a main dinner service which wa served 12 hr after take off then a breakfast meal before landing both meal were genuinely delicious all meat were tender and juicy and very wa perfectly cooked drink were provided whenever asked although crew were too busy serving all passenger to proactively offer top ups breakfast wa offered to passenger a they woke up which meant that people ate when they wanted rather than just in order almost but not quite like a la carte dining crew were friendly and efficient with some nice personality coming through this is fairly standard of my experience with ba in flight entertainment wa excellent good screen quality responsive touch screen excellent selection i did not use the wifi however it wa available on this aircraft and price are reasonable i think the seat is generally very comfortable and the storage compartment are convenient and spacious enough the crew on my aisle side of the plane forgot to unlock all the door so people had to work out how to do it themselves or periodically request the crew to do it for them whilst you can never complain about a fully flat bed the reverse herringbone layout doe make the footwell a bit cramped and also mean it a lot more comfortable to lie on one side rather than the other facing away from the door i did manage a few hour of sleep though so not too bad overall a really lovely flight and absolutely holding it own a a decent business class productservice

not verified we have flown this route with easyjet regularly for more than twenty year but at the age of 80 boarding at nice ha become so chaotic and wearing l decided to pay the significant extra amount to see if ba wa better the outward flight from heathrow wa not great but acceptable but when l attempted to checkin for the return l discovered that we did not have a booking at the time l booked l wa recovering from a serious illness and assumed that l must have made a mistake after considerable panic l booked last minute flight at considerable cost with easyjet boarding being the usual shamble flying into gatwick rather than heathrow the only way to get home wa a 120 taxi rather than a 2 bus fare from heathrow on arrival home l discovered that i did have an email confirmation of the return flight from ba so immediately contacted them to complain and ask for financial compensation in the two week since they have sent two apology for their slow response but nothing else so far we have elderly friend who say that they now find travelling with british airway so stressful that they will not travel outside the uk again this will help the environment but it seems remarkable that the airline industry in the uk ha deteriorated to this extent unfortunately jal or singapore both of which l have used happily over many year do not fly within europe

trip verified i wa going to fly to frankfurt from glasgow over london but the flight from london to frankfurt wa cancelled this meant i had to stay overnight in london where i have no accommodation etc a i wa rebooked to a flight from london city airport which wa more than 2h by train i had to get an uber and then take a hotel for 250 in total london price i wa reassured over the phone that i would get all the money back my flight from london city airport wa then cancelled again and rebooked to london heathrow but two day later i then cancelled that flight and rebooked a new one with lufthansa a i urgently had to get to work and needed the money i never received the money back for the hotel compensation for cancelled flight 1 compensation for cancelled flight 2 the extra food i had to pay for the uber or the actual cost of the flight i wa first transferred 3 by british airway they stopped replying to me and told me the issue wa weather condition although other nonba flight were going i lost over 700 in total and never got compensated for the loss of a work day either it just really feel like they dont care about people worst serviceairline ever

trip verified credit to ba flew to singapore recently and also back from doha to london and both experience were great service wa fantastic a wa the quality of the food entertainment and wa left feeling ba have got it together after a few previous below average experience you definitely notice the difference with the staff on ba far more approachable and outgoing compared to the cold and corporate middle eastern airline crew nice one ba for 2 great flight

trip verified the check in area for premium class at gatwick is very nice and there wa no queue when i arrived so i wa able to drop my bag very quickly premium security at gatwick is fine the flight wa delayed due to nats issue but the member of staff on arriving at the lounge let me know of this the lounge is nicevand it very comfortable there wa an excellent range of food and drink all the drink you would expect food wise there were sandwich soup pasta salad fruit spanish stew a well a turkey and ham pie with mashed potato roasted parsnip and carrot and gravy it wa all really good and particularly nice to see so many option boarding wa pretty slow although the gate crew did a good job to keep it well organised and allow priority passenger to board first a ha been well documented the onboard experience in term of seat on ba europe business is pretty poor but in line with other european carrier sadly that being said the seat is well padded and comfortable and the adjustable headrest is quite good the on board catering wa of excellent quality i wa lucky to get my preferred option of the roast turkey but several people sat near me werent a lucky i do understand that meal option may run out but when the meal option are roast turkey with all the trimming vegetarian cottage pie or a chicken salad you really should be stocking enough for every passenger to get the proper meal or failing that allow an order in advance service where you then only stock the meal that people want to eat whilst i fully support the desire to minimise waste both food and cost people really should really be able to get the ideal meal option unfortunately one of the people affected reacted very badly to this and took it out on the cabin crew which is unacceptable they also lost a bit of perspective about just how serious a situation it actually wa the cabin crew were very nice friendly and professional if a little slow but not to the point of detracting from the positive experience i had the ground service at gran canaria wa pretty poor priority bag clearly meant nothing 95 of bag coming out were not priority mine came out about halfway through bag delivery and demonstrates poor delivery of service and not fulfilling on the service they promise to their customer overall though it wa a very nice flight and having paid for it using avios and 1 i can not complain at all

trip verified i recently had a delay on british airway from bru to lhr that wa due to staff shortage they announced that there wa a 2 hour holding delay but they would board u immediately in hope of clearing the gate and leaving early we had to wait the full 2 hour inside the airplane the plane wa old dirty had no power at the seat the staff provided a small bag of pretzel and 250ml of water to the passenger for 2 hour delay and 2 hour flight there were no option to purchase food or drink there were no entertainment option available i am a oneworld emerald elite member but they do not upgrade member based on status first class lounge at heathrow are overcrowded understaffed and poorly equipped the help desk is completely unhelpful when an error arises with delay and cancellation even when having the top status the avios point system ha been devalued to near worthlessness and requires fee to book reward that nearly equal the price of the revenue ticket british ha lost it way in recent year and ha a moved from a worldclass airline to a budget airline with much worse service and timeliness than ryanair or easyjet

trip verified london heathrow to gibraltar on 24th october 2023 i shall start by reference to the booking process i used the ba website to reserve the seat and food the website to be easy to use and clear in every aspect the flight wa due to depart from terminal 3 but the passenger were bussed for a good 15 minute to a different part of the airport where the aircraft wa on a stand when boarding the flight the cabincrew kept a very low profile and this wa maintained during the entire flight the captain made 3 brief announcement during the flight there wa no inflight entertainment the seat were clean and comfortable enough for a short flight the lack of catering wa overt other than a tiny bottle of water and an inedible breakfast bar one had to use an online system to order even a drink and of course pay for it too the passenger next to me could not use the online system a it doe not seem to work and the cabin refused to sell them a coffee because of this fault moreover the usb charge point did not work either given the early hour of the flight it is a poor show that there are not even for sale item available from a trolley service the system ba have in place is not good enough the flight arrived ontime the disembarkation wa inefficient though and poorly managed and the crew were not to be seen the crew were wearing the new ba uniform and it seems to reflect a downward trend of the airline to be candid there wa any difference between this ba service and that of socalled budget rival on this route ba have a monopoly and so i did not have an option to use the service of a different company

trip verified our ba flight from porto to london heathrow t5 wa operated by finnair using a finnair plane and crew this had been advised by ba shortly after booking with the option to change flight if we preferred although the business class cabin wa of a similar layout to ba club europe ie with the middle seat kept free my wife and i felt the seat were more comfortable and the legroom slightly better service wa good on board and the meal wa very tasty we chose the beef cheek all wa good until we landed at heathrow although we passed through passport control without delay once we were at the designated baggage reclaim we just waited and waited after an hour and ten minute i went to the ba baggage counter to ask what wa going on they seemed unaware of an issue but said they would find out over the next hour or so various other passenger also requested information and despite various announcement and a list of different excuse it wa almost 2½ hour before the bag finally arrived frustrating to say the least i subsequently complained to ba but after 4 week there ha been no explanation just the automated message from customer service we are experiencing exceptionally high volume this response say a lot

trip verified the customer service call centre etc are atrocious and sometimes callous they just dont care long wait to speak to anybody who then have no power to actually solve anything and the call just cut halfway without resolution anyway if the flight are cancelled a were my original one youre really left on your own and nobody care the onboard service are soso but for short haul it now semilow cost which is confusing a you never know what to expect this time we were given a bottle of water and a very small snack whilst anything else had to be paid for and yet on some other flight apparently you have to preorder any additional food it confusing which make it not dependable cabin baggage is in theory generous compared to competitor in economy but then they asked more than half the passenger on this flight to check in the cabin baggage at the gate due to lack of space in the overhead cabin leading to long boarding delay their whole offering hasnt been thought through very well the usb power supply did not work throughout the flight contrary to the announcement that the power be available after the seatbelt sight wa turned off so it wa pointless providing the socket in the first place not my first choice airline on this route and am just trying to use up most of my avios point before i totally abandon them i fail to see how it is deemed a 4 star airline

trip verified i am a frequent flyer with ba and have been for the last 15 year having noted the rating given frankly i can not understand how ba score three star for most aspect of it service in a nutshell ba ha placed profit margin over passenger appreciation this fact wa hammered home on my return leg which wa not in club europe quite alarmingly ba appears to place profit over passenger safety by extending it business class seating up to and beyond emergency exit row and then failing to ensure those seated in exit row have the physical capacity to actually open the door incase of an emergency i wa not at all reassured to see an elderly and slightly built woman seated with the responsibility of opening the overwing exit should the need have arisen shorthaul business club europe is simply a joke and only useful for gaining valuable tier point for loungepreboarding benefit while cabin crew service is excellent the lack of space and reduction in refreshment choice etc place them a million airmiles behind competing airline such a qatar turkish or emirate who understand the true definition of customer appreciation and hospitality ba ha consistently eroded the value of their executive club and seems to be of the impression that recent change in obtaining avios point during the booking process benefit passenger really i want to support ba and did enjoy flying with them up to the point when they started penny pinching and became more deserving of the name budget airway the attached photo taking during my most recent itinerary highlight the difference in customer careappreciation between british airway and another airline used in this trip both flight were around 4 hour in duration on the same day guess which one is show ba inflight offering

service representative apologised and told me they could have changed the name at the cost of a small fee he offered to cancel my original ticket and issue me a partial refund then advising me that i trip verified we booked on the ba website round trip flight from seattle to amman with a stop in london in business class our first flight wa delayed and then diverted to nyc and enroute my husband experienced a medical emergency when we landed in nyc we were taken to a hospital and i stayed in constant contact with the airline agent who had arranged for the ambulance transfer the same evening we flew back home confirming cancellation of all remaining flight with the agent at the airport for the next several week we spoke many time with ba customer service trying to obtain some kind of refund we were met with contradictory explanation excuse and an absence of meaningful customer service we discovered we had been marked a noshows for our flight to amman and that our return flight wa still active we were unable to cancel the return on the website despite booking on the website our phone call were never returned we spent a minimum of 4060 minute on hold for every phone call we made our email received only canned reply without answer or explanation we were told it wa not possible to receive a copy of the ticketing rule and regulation nor to speak with a supervisor and after several week of this abysmal customer service i filed a complaint with the faa in response to my complaint i received an email from ba customer service explaining that they had reviewed my many request for a full refund but that could not be accommodated due to the ticketing rule they would issue flight credit except for the portion for which we noshowed they did not state how many credit we never once asked for a full refund we asked to read the rule and to receive a partial refund we will not use the credit we were fully refunded by our travel insurance

trip verified not only my first flight in 17 year but also my first time back to england for 17 year i flew from pmilgw on 21012023 and returned on 29012023 both wizz air and easyjet offered very inconvenient flight time and charged more than the flight were worth for baggage british airway were the most convenient and best value option available they offered ideal flight time and the 18 charge per flight for baggage wa very reasonable total cost for both flight wa 126 regular update information via email seamless online seat allocation and check in efficient staff at the check in desk at pmi and lgw ensured that long queue were dealt with a quickly a humanly possible immaculate aircraft comfortable leather seat with adequate legroom im 64 tall cabin crew were polite friendly and professional in flight food and drink were good quality and reasonably priced i enjoyed the meat ploughman and ipa beer 10 total on both flight i have flown 80 time in the last 50 year with different airline on various propeller and jet aircraft a well a one lgwlhr helicopter transfer flying wa a totally different experience back in the day we are now in the age of the budget airline nostalgia aside british airway are the best airline ive flown with

trip verified missing baggage customer service wa the worst ive ever experienced i arrived back in phoenix on sunday evening and air tag showed my bag arrived on monday but it took three more day before they were finally delivered i understood that due to delay caused by freezing fog in london my luggage did not make it onto my final flight i filled out the required form at the phoenix airport and then attempted to fill one out online where i received a message saying that the bag had already been reported missing and to enter the tracking code that had been sent to me via email but no email wa received i made phone call daily and wa told a message wa sent and i should hear back within 24 hour finally the email with the tracking number wa received on tuesday night i went online with the tracking number on wednesday and it requested that i provide the same information that i had given them on the form at the airport my luggage wa finally delivered on thursday afternoon

trip verified british airway are not the flag carrier they used to be the checkin staff at the club europe area did not display any premium service and did not provide a good overall service the gallery south lounge wa very busy but the food wa very good there is a good array of salad pasta bread and hot food available the festive turkey and ham pie wa particularly good the flight wa delayed a lhr wa very busy on a tuesday evening the boarding process wa stressful due to the lack of any queue management system and the majority of passenger congregating around the gate despite ba using a group system to board it took almost 1hr to board 240 passenger the flight itself wa good with a good club meal service the bar service wa good but it seems that ba have done away with champagne onboard and also in the lounge a menu is handed out prior to departure with a good food offering for the length of flight the food wa very good with beef cheek served with vegetable being chosen ba have always excelled with their catering and this ha not changed the seat is a standard economy seat with a table in the middle seat for club europe a standard practice for ba the seat wa comfortable but with limited leg room the cabin wa clean presentable and tidy with no issue the a321 featured wifi which contains a very good landing page with flight information access to the speedbird cafe menu access to bacom and a good pricing strategy for wither just messaging or streaming also overall the airline is still a good world player but with clear improvement needed with their ground staff the cabin manager wa very good but the other crew in club did not display the expected behaviour in business class she kept touching her face not making eye contact with passenger and seemed uninterested and like she did not want to be there

trip verified evening flight from lhr to iad on an a380 check in at t5 is poor most of their kiosk dont work well and staff have to be called boarding wa very poorly managed the ground staff were overwhelmed because it wa a full flight and were struggling to manage passenger the gate wa small and there wa insufficient seating for such a big aircraft the flight wa full and it left 50 minute late but the pilot kept u informed on this issue once airborne service started quite quickly and the cabin crew were very pleasant and helpful they did their job very professionally and efficiently they answered the call bell promptly and nothing wa too much trouble they started out with a bar service and were generous with drink and then came the meal service and the food wa very good the ife wa old and clunky but had sufficient movie and tv programme for a 75 hour flight the seat wa comfortable but legroom wa tight all in it wa an uneventful journey and i would give it the thumb up but ground service need attention

not verified lhrlax i prefer the boeing 777 over the a380 a the seat dont seem too cramped checkin wa very easy with the kiosk a wa bag drop and security at heathrow t5 is a whole other story once through security it up the escalator up the stair up the elevator down the escalator get to the gate no seating then down an escalator and finally down the jet bridge to the plane i have been in and out of heathrow many time but never in t5 before anyway cabin crew were pleasant drink and meal service were fine it wa a day flight so no real sleeping and passenger were all moving around most of the flight the entertainment system wa good with decent option so i occupied my time with several movie nice landing at lax all in all ba wa just fine

trip verified the checkin process wa smooth i got access to the iga lounge which wa nice but not a nice ha the turkish airline lounge on board wa what all this flight wa about this wa my first time flying intraeuropean business class and though i wa well prepared i still found it underwhelming first the seat is just a normal economy seat with the middle seat blocked off there is no personal ife so basically no entertainment for a 3hour flight meal service wa very slow and by the time it reached half of the business class cabin one of the 2 choice ran out plus the meal wa not a good a the economy meal i got on my turkish airline flight a few day ago i could see that staff did their best but since there were 32 business class passenger on a single aisle aircraft with a small galley there wa so much they could do also the 32 passenger shared one single wc meaning a long line for the bath room something i have rarely seen in business class arrived at lhr we did not get a contact gate but the thing wa that there wa no bus either and the crew announced that they had no idea when the bus would come it finally came of course and the delay wa more on the airport than the airline but since ba is the main operator at heathrow t5 such thing will affect their reputation

trip verified this is my first time flying ba new club suite which in my opinion is very good flight to the u including mine departed from concourse c of terminal 5 which did not have many shopping or dining option however it wa quiet so finding seating wa quite easy the highlight is the club suite which is spacious and provides a great deal of privacy meal service wa slow and everything wa served on one tray all at once i think now is the time for them to begin to get back to prepandemic standard at least the food tasted good which wa not something i previously experienced on ba flight even in first class

trip verified three flight london to reykjavik return and frankfurt to london generally the flight were of an acceptable standard though the seat and legroom are quite tight for a threehour flight the cabin crew were efficient and generally friendly a big plus for ba wa informative announcement from the cockpit often missing on other airline flight operated generally close to the advertised time but ba wa let down by chaotic checkin and boarding procedure in preparation for each flight the number of checkin staff wa one or at most two in frankfurt the lone checkin agent wa also checking in business class passenger why are economy class passenger boarded from the front and not from the back this wa standard across the three flight but slowed down the boarding process immensely a people seated further back tried to get past forward seated passenger stowing their enormous cabin baggage it would make much more sense to board people at the back first and to enforce baggage rule so that cabin crew are not wandering up and down the cabin trying to find overhead space for the hapless passenger who boarded last the small bottle of water and a halffull bag of crisp offered a a snack on a threehour flight to iceland wa just tokenism and compared badly with what air france offered on a subsequent short flight to paris at reykjavik there wa no departure lounge next to the gate passenger had to queue wherever they could in the corridor

trip verified i travelled on the 11th april with my baby in economy class flight ba 2260 and ba 2508 i had the pleasure of meeting sarah air stewardess she wa absolutely amazing i received great service from her along with other staff but more importantly she went above and beyond it wa hard enough travelling with an infant but her assistance throughout the flight wa really appreciated she repeatedly asked if i needed anything a i had arham in my lap most of the time she held him whilst i had a cup of tea at the front of the aircraft we had a chat and the service wa just amazing it is something i will never forget thank you for being there and for all your support throughout the flight i have worked in aviation but the job you do is remarkable and under appreciated hope you see this

trip verified recent trip to boston departing lhr t5 ground staff were absolutely fantastic and made an extra effort to make sure we were prepared for all the covid entry requirement in the u they were really friendly and personable very short queue for bag drop and security i would say it took u 20 minute from kerbside to lounge which is fantastic considering what is going on in the uk at the moment boarding wa very quick and efficient and wa completed within 30 minute seated on the last row of economy i really appreciated the low density 333 layout in economy compared to the 10 abreast seating myself and my colleague strategically booked the aisle seat either side of the centre and were lucky enough to have no one sat between u which really helped considering most of the foot space in these older seat is taken up by the ife box it really helped and would have been significantly le comfortable had we been sat next to each other the cabin crew were excellent well trained and personable they were very visible throughout the flight and proactively offered drink outside of meal service meal service wa very efficient with cabin crew proactively removing tray from people who had finished early something that you very rarely see in economy the food by doco wa exceptional i dont think ive eaten so much on a transatlantic flight in economy it will be interesting to compare it on the return flight when it catered by an outstation overall it wa a great flight helped by the additional space we had but nonetheless a good performance by ba which totally exceeded my expectation based on the review here and elsewhere i would definitely consider flying with them again

trip verified the short haul flight were the best with the crew on the final leg giving the excellent service that we all hope for we chose out flight very carefully so that we were booked on flight with the club world suit not the ying yang arrangement that they still offer at the last minute the aircraft wa changed so we had to put up with the ying yang which really should have been pensioned off age ago most business class offer 4 across but this layout still squeeze in 8 across a we only take one long haul leisure trip a year in business class we always lose out on the point game but i take exception to having paid in full on a non refundable basis not to be allowed to reserve my seat the point gained from this trip alone would have allowed u bronze status but we were not given this status until after the trip when it is useless to u this status would have allowed u to book the seat 7 day prior to departure when they were still available rather than the 24 hour when they were not available on the long haul return flight i wa unable to book a window seat but on boarding after the door had closed there wa a window seat still vacant i asked if i could move and wa told by the fa she would check nothing happened but after takeoff a passenger wa moved from economy to that seat judging by the interaction between them i would bet it wa someone on staff travel i think it disgraceful that a full fare paying passenger should be treated like this takeoff wa just after 1930 hr but we were not offered a drink service before supper but were told we could order a drink that would be delivered on out tray with the meal had we done this our meal would have been cold by the time we ate it in summary would i ever fly with ba again no not if i had half a chance of going with another airline

not verified ba is getting a real bashing on this forum and i thought id buck the trend and report a virtually flawless experience of a short hop from edi to lcy on ba8703 this monday easy check in decent lounge experience except the very amiable staff were still forced to serve from behind barrier very clean plane which left on time ridiculous amount of legroom in 2d it is a bulkhead seat but with lot more space than 1a or c reasonable cooked breakfast served by a very attentive and capable csm and arrived 15 min earlier than scheduled whats not to like which is my overall experience with the vast majority of my ba experience over the last 25 year anyway i thought it would be nice to read a positive review for once

trip verified flew to barbados 16 march on ba 255 in the new club class suite a huge improvement on the old yin and yang club class which we unfortunately endured on the way back comfortable big tv screen with high quality picture and good headphone plenty of nook and cranny for storing small item and very private nice friendly fa called by my name from the off and pretty good drink service with a good dinner served once again let down by a poor at best choice of movie on the inflight entertainment system thank goodness the latest james bond movie wa showing took off and landed on time smooth flight only one letdown the usual extortionate fee charged for prebooking a seat come on ba stop nickel and diming it spoil what could be a really good business class product and after all we already pay quite a bit for the privilege i recommend with the usual caveat

not verified very poor flight from cape town to london after the chaos of cape town airport passenger handling with incredibly long queue to get through security and then passport control taking nearly two hour in total we arrived at the lounge somewhat frazzled and were very happy to find a quiet area with decent wine and appropriate food choice for a break before boarding the flight boarding went well and we were seated and offered a small half full glass of champagne the captain made an announcement to say that we were all aboard ahead of schedule and that the flight time would be shorter than scheduled but unfortunately this would mean our arrival would be too early to land due to the 600 am lifting of the overnight jet ban at heathrow so we would have to wait on the ground for perhaps half an hour or so this wa no big deal then the captain announced that due to it issue at heathrow they could get not compile necessary paperwork so we would be delayed for an indefinite period with the delay of uncertain duration one might have hoped for a further offering of champagne or other beverage in particularly for business class but this wa not forthcoming in the event take off wa permitted quite soon after the crew had distributed menu but then did a pa to say that there were change to each of the main course a drink order wa taken for pre dinner drink for main course for dinner and choice of wine with dinner drink and nut were served circa 45 minute after take off in my case a small measure of white wine in the bottom of a pleasant and decent sized tumbler and my husband had another half glass of champagne dinner arrived on a single tray with a small measure of red wine in the tumbler the food looked bland unappetising and tasted the more so the cheese two small piece were sitting in a greasy pool of vinegary chutney no top up of the wine wa offered we did ask for a second glass and it wa provided on a very individualised basis and coffee wa not served since we had hit some mild turbulence the flight wa some 11 hour in duration and no other snack or beverage were offered prior to breakfast which wa provided separately to each passenger a they showed sign of being awake breakfast wa slightly more edible than dinner coffee or tea were offered by individual mug orange juice wa available on request cabin crew were largely absent from the cabin except during the meal service but it must be said that they were extremely pleasant and were suitably responsive to request for individual item come on british airway you can and need to do better than this if you are to meet customer expectation and compete with other airline on similar route for the cost of a business class ticket passenger are enjoying only additional space and seat comfort flatbed a a benefit over an economy ticket at or below 25 of the price paid for the premium cabin time wa when flying in business class wa real treat no longer is this the case

not verified feb 25 2022 we show up at the airport 3 hour early for our flight to dublin we waited in line for 3 hour to just check in our luggage after that we learn our flight is delayed another 3 hour we had a connecting flight in london when trying to go through custom they wouldnt let u through because the boarding of the plane wa going to be happening in 30 minute they told u to wait in a customer service line that wa well over an hour we then found out we could have gone through custom because the connecting flight from london to dublin wa delayed over an hour however by the time we were told this information the door were about to close the next available flight to dublin wa 227 late evening with that being said we were forced to stay the night in london after talking to a british airway manager they informed u that ba would reimburse u for any hotel flight to get to dublin regardless of the airline clothes due to them losing our bag excursion and transportation due to this issue we had to spend multiple day shopping for clothes lost out on day we had booked to explore the country had to now buy an extra suitcase for the new clothes we received went 4 day with lost bag when we finally got home we submitted our claim like we were told to do within a few day it declined we have asked for a contact just to talk to somebody again declined we tried to reach out via social medium and we get passiveaggressive message they refuse to pay me back for the new flight to get to dublin transportation to and from the airport in london the hotel for london the clothes i had to buy because they lost my bag for 4 day and the extra luggage fee because of the extra clothes i had to buy there is no customer support and they are impossible to get a direct response from

trip verified british airway are in the process of upgrading all it 777 fleet to the new club suite but ba59 had the 16yrsold packedlikesardines club world product the lounge at cpt wa also bursting at the seam and food order were so behind that many passenger had left by the time their food arrived on boarding we were surprised to find that the menu amenity kit and bottle of water had already been placed in the storage drawer we suspect this is another cynical timesaving initiative on the part of ba frustratingly the menu turned out to be incorrect and the replacement dish were probably the worst we have ever encountered in any business class on any airline the drink run wa cancelled without any warning on the spurious basis of a passenger with a nut allergy it hard to avoid suspicion that cabin crew were being economical with the truth apart from a rather turbulent ride the flight wa otherwise uneventful and arrival wa slightly ahead of schedule baggage handling wa however atrociously slow

trip verified we flew to funchal madeira yesterday madeira ha no covid restriction for entry yet ba asked u to upload our nh vaccination pass before we could check in online i received an ok about an hour later but my husband did not so i couldnt check in online we arrive at heathrow 2 hour before departure and stood in a long queue for check in there were just 3 desk open for a queue of approx 100 traveller then several people went on break or disappeared so we were down to one desk open with the queue barely moving i went to complain to various ba staff who said the manager had been told and more people were coming one blonde lady walked around for age shepherding traveller into the queue before sitting down at a desk another man later did likewise making u wonder why they hadnt simply worked at the desk from the beginning all in all we stood in that queue for a good hour before almost running to the security queue which thankfully moved quickly then we hurriedly bought a sandwich walked to our departure gate and stood on the bus to the plane the whole experience wa extremely stressful and took the best part of 2 hour we did not have time to sit down until we did so on the plane and completely unnecessary if we had been able to check in online this would not have happened my husband vaccination pas is fine but not required for madeira i think it is a system failure a he received an email yesterday morning saying his pas wa not in order a did i even though id previously been told i could check in online also unnecessary a if ba had staffed the desk properly the queue would have moved a staff member told u ba had laid off lot of staff during lock down and wa now begging them to return but having been treated badly they didnt want to the flight itself wa fine on time we were given a bag of crisp and a bottle of water again fine nothing praise worthy

trip verified this past novemberdecember i flew washingtonlondon return and on the strength of that trip my first in two year the inflight service quality appears to have pretty much returned to the prepandemic status quo ante the cabin wa clean and well maintained seat were comfortable food and drink were good including a very tasty hertfordshire roast pork on the return leg and the ba cabin crew remain the best in the business this wa one of a number of booking that i had to rebook a number of time due to flight cancellation and contrary to the experience of many here my rebookings were handled courteously and thoroughly although i did have a number of lengthy wait on hold but under the present circumstance thats to be expected it good to see that the everyday product ha held up so well amid this dreadful time and im looking forward to future trip on ba

trip verified i had the best experience i have ever had with an airline our initial flight to dubai wa canceled by royal air maroc and we had to find a new flight at the last minute i found that booking with them wa extremely simple unfortunately we had to cancel our flight the day of the departure i called the customer service waited about 20 minute before i could speak with someone and within 15 minute the flight wa canceled and they offered me a full refund the person on the line wa extremely nice understanding and willing to help u i had never dealt with such a nice employee from any airline i got the full refund on my credit card the day after i usually chose the cheapest flight ticket regardless of the airline but from now on ill definitely make sure to check with british airway first

not verified ba cancelled our original return flight and rebooked u a day later we had no issue with this just enjoyed an extra day holiday but others might not have been so flexible however they overlooked rebooking our connecting flight from lhr and we were fortunate that there wa still space on the flight when we checked in at atl the aircraft wa newish and in excellent condition flight wa around 50 capacity service wa excellent staff were friendly and efficient dinner wa good breakfast wa disappointing with little choice the lhr to bhd leg wa equally good and i am beginning to think that ba are getting their mojo back again

trip verified boarding wa slow and uncomfortable on account of the lack aircon at the gate the club suite cabin were about 34 full but the rest of the plane cant have been much more than 20 occupancy whether this is the reason why cabin crew on the flight were cut to the bare minimum is hard to say but they certainly had to work hard covering multiple cabin despite that the drink and food service in business wa efficient and the current policy of serving all course at once meant that dinner wa done and dusted two hour after takeoff which is a real bonus on a nighttime flight however the quality of the food remains mediocre at best and the pasta dish wa almost inedible the club suite is a big improvement on the ancient cw product although storage is a funny arrangement of tiny compartment that invite losing a smartphone or two one definitely miss the drawer at foot level in old cw the large screen really improves the viewing experience and the whole ife system wa much more responsive the new seat dont significantly aid sleeping particularly a there an obvious ridge at the level of the base of the spine waking up two hour before touchdown is definitely to be recommended in order to get breakfast over and to avoid the usual queue for the toilet performance of the flight deck wa up to it usual high standard and arrival wa twenty minute ahead of schedule progress through border control wa speedy but baggage collection wa delayed for unspecified reason overall a good flight

trip verified return trip cape town to durban in club class highlighted the inconsistency our outbound trip in december wa good in all respect whereas the return trip wa disappointing check in wa fine apart from the agent failing to label one of bag priority resulting in a long wait for our third bag the lounge wa busy but no complaint we went to the boarding gate at the check in time indicated on the screen where there wa no sign of activity although the screen wa still showing the same gate and departure time shortly thereafter two ground staff appeared and when approached said the flight wa delayed from 1330 to 1410 and the gate wa changed to the lower level bus gate the informational screen had now updated to the delayed time and new gate i checked on the flight radar app which showed that our aircraft had started in durban and flown to cape town port elizabeth back to cape town and it had been clear for some time that it had no hope of being on time for our flight in fact looking at it schedule and turn around time it wa always going to be late boarding eventually started at 1400 with departure at 1430 60 minute late drink service only started 30 minute later followed by lunch the food wa good but the wine offering very mediocre and not up to club standard with the price of good wine in south africa there is no excuse for serving poor wine lunch service wa quick but then the crew disappeared behind the curtain and there wa no offering of top up drink unless specifically requested overall this wa a disappointing flight with a lacklustre crew

trip verified i used british airway for the first time and i have to admit that i am impressed with their service firstly i want to thank the lady that assisted me to weigh my luggage my flight wa 1610 however due to unforeseen circumstance i arrived at the airport around 1540 i wa convinced that i wa going to miss my flight because the queue wa very long i stood there a few minute but then realized that i would miss my flight i went to club checkin and the lady wa incredibly kind to me i just can not believe how patience she wa with me even though i wa at fault she weighed my luggage and i wa able to board the flight successfully i wa not aware that this airline give out free meal we got a sandwich and drink and we had an option to choose between vegetarian and chicken i personally love free stuff so i will be ditching flysafair even though they have excellent service a well in the near future unfortunately diversity the first time i flew wa in 2018 and i have to admit that i have never seen such diversity amongst cabin crew staff however with british airway it wa different the staff wa very kind and friendly a well what a wonderful experience to fly with these guy

trip verified after two year of being unable to fly to our second home in south africa because of covid it wa fantastic to be back on board a ba flight to cpt and in the club suite seat 1k and 2k to boot these seat are a huge improvement on the old yinyang cw seat in term of privacy ease of access and the ife screen but the cabin still felt densely occupied and the seat were just a uncomfortable when lying flat storage wa a mixed blessing too with three rather fussy little compartment rather than the decent sized drawer in the old cw meaning that a laptop would have to be stored above the food onboard wa woeful although serving all three course at the same time doe at least mean that the dinner service isnt dragged out cabin crew went about their business dutifully but with little enthusiasm and there were the usual queue for the toilet the flight itself wa uneventful and landing wa more or le on time cpt had an efficient arrangement for checking form immediately after leaving the airbridge and there were no queue at immigration it wa good to be back

trip verified i paid 1189 for a round trip flight to london and back in premium economy they bumped me from the seat for the flight back and told me id be issued a refund instead of being issued a refund i had to contact them through several different method phone website twitter and finally email they told me id be getting 22916 back which is le than half of the 589 i paid for the upgrade instead they refunded 1458 i emailed again and they told me id be getting 11516 more back when i emailed again saying that that doesnt add up to the original amount i wa told i wa getting they simply replied with thats the final amount turn out that meant they were taking back the initial refund of 1458 and i wa only getting 11516 total so i emailed them again asking why they changed the amount and theyve yet to respond so i called this morning and after explaining politely what i wa calling for they hung up on me

trip verified very nice return flight with ba to add to my previous review i really like how ba organises boarding and disembarking process in group this is super comfortable a 100 passenger dont jump out and then sweat in a queue when the gate is not even there the a320 wa new and the cabin had a fresh feeling with nice mood lighting row 1 ha an enhanced legroom and thus make the 1hour hop very comfortable once again amazing staff and they were even more attentive and accommodating to gold level passenger always coming and asking if any help is needed lovely humus beetroot and quinoa salad for food great wifi at really competitive pricing i think it is great that they also have food alcohol offered to buy online for all travel class domestic t5 arrival is a breeze

trip verified overall a very lovely flight with ba to edinburgh during christmas holiday lounge wa ok quite worn out although staff and food were nice much better than when i travelled last time although the plane seemed old the cabin felt very fresh clean temperature perfectly adjusted to my liking around 2223c and had a funky lighting although seat are the same a those in economy they are pretty comfortable for a 1hour hop much better than those at air france and together with an enhanced legroom in row 1 it wa wonderful for gold card passenger ba automatically reserve row 1 in club europe with enhanced legroom which i think is a great touch the crew especially the purser were phenomenal extremely friendly adaptive to your need and professional leaving a very pleasant flight aftertaste afternoon tea catering wa lovely for this short flight sandwich and scone were tasty i am actually a fan of wellpresented however simpler meal on board to my opinion they are just tastier and give a feeling of trust for a quick hop ba ticked all the mark here in comparison on a cdglhr leg air france presented a chic cold starter however to me it looked a bit too complicated and except from the duck terrine rather unappetising klm served a super nice and simple chicken caesar but it wa in a paper box one big drawback wa the first wing experience at t5 the queue there wa so long that i decided to go through the regular line instead it quite disappointing given how much money regular flyer their company spend to earn a gold status nevertheless the flight and most importantly the crew completely negated that drawback the flight wa 200 one way 600 return incl transfer to kirkwall which wa pretty expensive however the service seemed like it wa worth the money

trip verified it is first time we have flown ba business class in a 777 aircraft and hopefully it will be the last firstly the checkin and crew were great friendly and helpful it wa manual checkin not a machine which is always much nicer no complaint at all in that department food on the journey wa adequate but no choice of starter or desert and 3 choice for main course business class seating is 242 with alternate seat facing backwards a are both the centre seat we were in those so you are either facing a stranger on the aisle seat or you put the screen up and you are in a claustrophobic bubble you can not see out you can not see other passenger it wa slightly better a it wa my wife and myself but it would be utterly awful to be shut in this space with a stranger nowhere to put a glass bottle of water book or glass within easy reach unless you keep the table down in most business class seat you can tuck your bag under the seat in front for take off and landing but there is nowhere to put a bag so everything ha to go in the overhead locker and they are missing over the first 4 row of centre seat so not much storage space we were in row 1 and to get out you have to climb over the leg and leg rest of the person in the aisle seat in row 2 now if you are travelling solo in the centre seat that is always the case but normally if a a couple you take aisle and centre at least you are climbing over your partner leg not some stranger i am 5ft 10 and could just about manage my wife at 5ft 4 could not get over without disturbing the passenger in the row behind the reading light wa hopeless and did not shine on your book and the light controlled from the handset did not work at all this is utterly awful design and will certainly make u avoid ba in future if at all possible

a they had moved me to an earlier a much earlier flight the same day only problem wa this earlier flight departed around two hour before my flight from bhd arrived i would have thought that this would form on the hungarian police website that wa a confusing mix of hungarian and pidgin english anyway form filled in with flight number etc emailed to the authority there and exemption granted so i took sent and admiration granted and flight re booked what could go wrong around three week before i wa due to travel ba rather unsportingly decided to cancel my flight to bud again needle to say i wa indifference to ruining week of preparation on my part and the fact that i lost a not inconsiderable sum of money ive decided to avoid ba from now on

trip verified i usually avoid ba because of it appalling customer service and sneaky extra charge but this flight wa my only option note that ba actually charge for seat preselection in biz class 100 uk pound in this case doe any other airline in the world dare do that i saved the money and waited until checkin to choose my seat for free the seat were ba universally derided cramped 6across backtofront configuration where you stare into the face of your seat mate an arm length away no other airline ever came up with this awkward arrangement i wonder why no preflight drink wa offered at meal time i selected one of the three main offering only to be told it wasnt available even though there were only 3 people in my 16 seat biz section the seat area ha practically no storage except a tiny drawer at ankle level that is inaccessible when the seat is in lie flat position the bed is the narrowest i have experienced in biz class and is also very hard the cabin wa very cold and the blanket very thin i had to raid blanket from two other seat just to stay warm the amenity kit is the smallest ive ever seen in biz class it fit in the palm of the hand all in all this uncomfortable miserly experience is hardly worth the 5727 that ba charge for this route i used mile to pay for my ticket but of course got whacked with ba unique and notorious fuel surcharge fee of 636 for using mile

not verified overall i have to say i am really pleased with the service ba provided given the circumstance which must be particularly challenging for airline i had to call ba a few time regarding both my outbound and return flight and i would rate their customer service 1010 everyone i talked to wa extremely friendly and helpful one employee even tried to help me figure out the recently updated arrival regulation from an italian website and listened to my rant about constantly changing restriction and quarantine i wa refunded promptly for part of my flight that had been cancelled and i wa able to change my return flight to a completely different route and date with only a minimal charge they have really shown flexibility here which is needed when travelling in 2020 the flight itself wa fine and i appreciate that food and drink option are currently a bit limited given that everyone should wear their mask a much a possible rather than sipping tea the one thing which i mean a constructive criticism though i think ba could improve is a little more exchange with their destination airport the arrival sheet for italy we were given on the flight were outdated and the ground staff in heathrow in charge of the boarding procedure did not even know that swab test were now mandatory for arrival in italy when i asked him whether he knew any detail of what to expect in venice thats fine on the first day after yet another update but this rule had been in place for 4 day on the day i travelled overall my experience with ba wa very positive though and i am happy to spend a little more on my flight than i would with some cheaper airline for the great customer service i received

trip verified london heathrow to toronto my wife and i used avios and the ba amex companion voucher to get a very good deal to fly business class on our holiday i wa also excited to fly on an a350 for the first time and it definitely lived up to my expectation the breakfast buffet in the ba lounge in heathrow t5 wa okay not amazing and there wa a good range of drink and comfortable settee the aircraft felt very clean and fresh and had good mood lighting very comfortable spacious seat and large highresolution ife screen i like the moving map but my wife opted for the movie and wa impressed with the selection available we both enjoyed the food and wine on board and it wa a professional and friendly service from the cabin crew the a350 is a lot quieter than older aircraft like the 747 and 777

trip verified my wife and i used avios and my ba amex companion voucher to get a very good deal for business class flight to our holiday before the coronavirus lockdown wa on the horizon the checkin and security were very efficient and the lounge not belonging to ba wa clean but had a more limited range of food than i would have expected boarding wa very quick and cabin crew were friendly and professional i am a big fan of the iconic 747 but we flew out on one of ba new a350s and this brought home to me that the 747 business class is looking tired and old in comparison the seat were comfortable and the food wa good but small and very low quality ife screen wa behind the time however it wa a night flight so i slept most of the journey except when there wa moderate turbulence caused by strong tailwind

holiday inn there are about 15 in san diego cue horde of passenger looking for shuttle bus in the wrong place arriving at hotel with no booking etc etc next the replacement flight the clunky app kept calling ba they wouldnt talk to me because i failed security i didnt know the billing address of the specific booking which wa done by my company travel department despite having a full executive club
