trip verified london to bangkok it not what it used to be but most importantly it doe not deliver what it promise any longer disappointing food outdated and uncomfortable seat appalling baggage handling at lhr and mediocre crew service onboard the customer service online is just a bad my most recent experience wa early january 2020 when they put me next to a couple with a newborn baby in club world on an overnight flight from lhr to bkk baby scream could not sleep and a the cabin wa full they could not move me the couple wa very nice apologetic and we just had to bear the 12 hour long haul flight together however my dealing with customer service wa appalling when is ba going to offer a kid free zone in club world for people who need to work or sleep

not verified london to johannesburg departure wa slightly delayed by 50 mph gust but once away the flight wa the usual comfortable experience on the upper deck seat 53jk are some of the best a long a the galley is quiet the dinner service wa efficient and we were ready for sleep after a film cabin crew were pleasant and attentive toilet were kept clean throughout the flight arrival wa 30 minute behind time but baggage collection and custom were mercifully quick so we were in the slow lounge just 40 minute after landing overall a good flight

trip verified overall a very comfortable flight with british airway both of my flight took off on time and reached on time i wa really excited to fly ba since they changed the aircraft from boeing 777200 to a boeing 747400 which is known a the queen of the sky the flight attendant are very nice and professional towards passenger they did their best to speed up the boarding process since both of my flight were full and we took off everything went well on my first flight and also flight time went short over the atlantic due to great tail wind on my second flight to mumbai the flight attendant were polite and respectful and gave the best service however during the lunch service they ran out of vegetarian food option and had to fetch for vegetarian food in other cabin and even give crew meal to passenger who were vegetarian overall my both flight with ba were good there are some shortcoming on their older fleet like lack of usb port power outlet old ife the ife box in front of you that block your legroom ba need to refurbish their old cabin on boeing 777200 and boeing 747if they still plan to use them on longer flight

trip verified fantastic flight travelled solo from london gatwick to glasgow in british airway club europe cabin and could not fault one aspect of the service i arrived at gatwick around 2 hour prior to departure all ba club world passenger are entitled to fast track security at gatwick this wa quick and the staff were pleasant enough the lounge at gatwick wa clean and modern and made for a nice relaxing start to the journey boarding wa quick and the flight departed ontime and landed 10 minute early the crew were very attentive and friendly the inflight meal wa delicious i had smoked salmon served with curried rice overall a really lovely flying experience had there been eversoslightly more leg room and inflight entertainment id have given this flight 1010 a fantastic crew who were a credit to the airline

trip verified rio de janeiro to london heathrow love this aircraft only a 3 class business world traveller plus and economy class 2 cabin in business class front 3 row and rear 2 row i had seat 3a in my opinion the seat window seat with a bit more space than the usual seat at 64 a little extra help very private tucked behind second galley area toilet is over the other side jk i settled in to sleep and did not have an evening meal crew very accommodating a they offered water bottle immediately a good few hour sleep a normal and woke up about 10 minute before breakfast i really enjoyed the fruit yoghurt muesli and the full english breakfast all in all great service good flight and felt fully relaxed

trip verified gatwick to tirana i wa incredibly disappointed by the service provided on this flight because it wa virtually impossible for me to differentiate what made this flight different from being in economy business class passenger boarded at the same time a economy class passenger there wa no curtain dividing economy class from business class and the people in economy class had taken the liberty of removing my cabin bag from my space above my seat to three seat behind me the seat were the same seat you have in economy the difference being that the middle seat is empty thus creating a divide between window and aisle seat i encountered odd problem with the meal a well the lovely cabin crew member notified me that i had no other choice but to eat pasta for dinner because other choice had finished you are better off in economy a you pay le and get the same service flight left on time and landed early british airway have in my opinion the best inflight wfi service for 10 pound you get unlimited very high speed wifi where you can stream youtube video they offer cheaper package a well where you can get unlimited text

not verified keflavik to london heathrow cabin crew were amazing weather wa terrifying a we drove to the airport so we knew thing were going to be tough expecting a delay and seeing other european flight were cancelled we expected the same but then were surprised to see our flight boarding snow in blizzard condition we were surprised but got settled in our seat crew very friendly and a long story short after 3 hour on the ground waiting for the diicing machine we finally made our way to take off all the staff were so relaxed and calm with all passenger including those who had connecting flight they sat with each one and personally looked at their option the ba online app to help them nonalcoholic drink and snack were provided during this time the first officer kept u informed all the time that is wa not ba fault that the deicing machine wa delayed so much eventually procedure done we were ready for takeoff how the pilot and team managed this in these condition i will never now but it wa a smooth take off an when through the cloud a smooth journey all the way back to heathrow cabin crew provided excellent service being business we were lucky to have champagne and our meal were excellent veg shepherd pie and chicken curry both lovely so just want to thank you ba we know you get a lot of negative review but this is to say we cant fault you particularly the crew who made a real effort to talk to all of u well done

trip verified brussels to bangkok via london club world from london to bangkok on 17 nov 2019 seat 15c and 15d it wa a boeing 777 with a 242 seat configuration in the business cabin which give the cabin a crowded impression the seat are comfortable with a flat bed mattress good selection of entertainment although a rather small screen the food menu offer different choice of starter main course and dessert the food wa disappointing i had smoked salmon a a starter and british beef a main course my soup wa cold mybeef wa overcooked and quantity wa economy classlike the service is very friendly but not personal im used to be adressed by my name when i fly business class while serving the meal they forget serving me wine the amount of cabin crew is not enough for a crowded business class cabin after dinner i went to sleep the seat is turned into a real bed with an extra mattress and a good pillow the space is narrow it is difficult to make the bed once the bed is made there is no place to put personal stuff i had a real good night of sleep though if your seat is not at the aisle you have to step over someone leg to go to the toilet the toilet are small and simple not cleaned frequently enough when i woke up breakfast service wa running the breakfast is good yoghurt pastry fresh fruit and a full english breakfast overall british airway world club is a rather standard business class lack personalized attention and lack the feel good experience if ba want to compete they have a long way to go i hope they can make it up a bit on our return flight

trip verified tirana to london gatwick i fly british airway around six time a month thanks to my work and while i almost always have a pleasant experience this past flight definitely outdid all the others we boarded and departed exactly on time with a very friendly and welcoming crew while the flight wa fully booked my travel companion and i were lucky that no one wa sitting on our row so that we could have an empty middle seat and therefore more space the best surprise of this flight by far wa the availability of wifi which i have never had on any other british airway flight within europe in fact the wifi package i got which included only texting wa unlimited and incredibly fast a good a my home connection this truly made this flight more enjoyable a it allowed me to continue my business even during the flight which is extremely valuable to me something that british airway can improve on would be leg space which in this flight i noticed wa particularly tight although that is a common problem for me a i am 188 cm tall also for unknown reason no food or snack were served on this 2 hour 45 minute flight only drink this wa a slight struggle a i had skipped breakfast but i managed well the flight however arrived ahead of schedule and we deboarded quickly i always recommend ba and will continue to do so
trip verified gatwick to st lucia great service on this flight thank you very much for the cabin and the great cabin crew excellent service

trip verified london to singapore i have to commend ba staff on this occasion they were friendly welcoming and so accommodating to passenger throughout the flight even in the last few moment they were laughing and joking with u highly professional and sensitive to our need despite their own tiredness thank you ba for making a long journey a tolerable one

trip verified london to san francisco return in economy the seat are small outbound wa bearable because there wa an empty seat between the two of u but returning no empty seat and it wa horrible im only 55 and female but couldnt lean down to the seat in front of me to collect my belonging if you want to get anything from your bag below the seat in front of you you will need to do some major maneuvering touching the person next to you throughout the flight is unavoidable i flew on a 747 both way they no longer have any air vent you can adjust so both flight got stuffy and warm i had to ask them to turn up the ac both way i wa literally sweating economy is small with the aircraft mostly made up of business class asian vegetarian meal wa good a usual although the breakfast wa terrible asian vegetarian breakfast in economy plus is much better i will find an alternative airline for my long haul flight it not worth it

trip verified london to belfast british airway bullied my parent and spoilt a special occasion i booked my parent on ba to attend my investiture at the palace my mother had a heart attack 3 month ago and this wa her first flight post recovery and i had chosen ba expecting the best level of service instead they were treated appallingly and felt bullied by the airline staff my mother suffers from claustrophobia and always request an aisle seat and i booked my parent on 2 aisle seat side by side i printed their boarding pass out myself with seat 24c and 24d on arrival at checkin one of the boarding pass wa not recognised by the scanner so assistance printed out a new one on going through security the boarding pas wa again not recognised and a new pas wa printed once my parent arrived at the gate they noticed that one of the seat had been changed my father explained the situation but the rep at checkin started quoting the geneva convention that ba are only contracted to get them from a to b and could change seat if they wanted waiting at the gate to try and resolve the situation and eventually with 5 minute before airborne they were rushed into the aircraft and forced to sit apart with no care for their welfare or circumstance at no stage did they receive any apologetic word for someone recovering from a heart attack this wa an unnecessary stressful event and spoilt what had been a special family occasion i have been holding on with the hope that ba slide from grace will halt but seem to be constantly disappointed i will await ba response to my parent i know they will not fly the carrier again but i will be handing back my ba amex and all point if an appropriate apology is not issued will update in summary dont trust ba with your loved one care

trip verified london to cape town we had booked business class ticket a year in advance for a trip to africa i usually fly star alliance but picked ba for a segment for better connection timing through london to cape town this wa a huge mistake i had tried to reserve seat on ba website twice and wa not able to do so then i tried to call ba twice and gave up after being on hold for an hour each time with no call back option when we arrived today in london from toronto at the connection desk seven hour before our flight we were told that business class wa oversold and we would be downgraded to premium economy ba representative told u that because we did not have reserved seat we were at the bottom of the list for business class and that loyalty customer would all have priority for seat over u but we would still be welcome in the lounge a if this wa a bonus then there wa a problem for u to clear security to get to the lounge since they could not print our boarding pass due to the down grade it took close to an hour to get settled into the lounge from the time we first arrived at the connecting desk we asked to speak to a manager but at each of our four interaction with ba staff we were told that they would get some to speak with u giving the impression that they were trying to pas off unhappy customer a fast a they could at one point i got visibly frustrated after the ba staff issuing our new boarding pass indicated that our down grade wa voluntary which it definitely wa not after two and a half hour ba customer service manager came to speak with u they were the first one who were actually apologetic and tried to address the situation from a customer oriented perspective if british airway think giving bulkhead seat in premium economy and basic lounge access to paying business class passenger is adequate customer service for a downgrade from a paid business fare on our upcoming overnight flight i will not be booking flight on ba again

trip verified dubai to london heathrow i flew on the a350 on one of it first trip and will be flying it again on the same multi segment trip i tried sq business class and ek business class and sadly the old ba business class on an aging b777 on overnight trip the new business suite offering from ba is the best business class i have experienced i am a ba gold card holder and the experience wa outstanding the first lounge at dxb wa very good with plenty of seating and a good choice of drink food choice in the lounge wa limited but not an issue on board the new suite wa very comfortable and i had a great night sleep with the closed door making all the difference to getting a full six hour in the bed wa very comfortable food choice were very limited soup and sandwich although this did suit the timing of the flight i would say this is an excellent very serious business product for night time business traveller whether it work for leisure traveller who want to wow rather than sleep or daytime traveller i dont know but i certainly could work very effectively in my suite downside is the ife is still rubbish in relation to the rest of the product

not verified i wish i could give a zero i wa booked on a flight from newark to madrid via london i come to find that the minimum layover time in london is 1 hr my flight layover in london wa 1hr5min british airway promised that the arriving and departing terminal in london were the same but that wa a total lie my wife and i were sprinting across the airport but between getting off the aeroplane having to go through security again and having to get to the other side of the airport for our connection we missed the layover flight we had the same route in the reverse direction i called ba hoping to change the return flight and explained this situation they kept insisting that since the layover wa a staggering 5 minute more than london minimum 1hr layover threshold that they were unable to help in any way british airway ha by far the worst customer service i have ever experienced ryanair which is a nofrills airline ha better customer service and that is saying something i will never be flying ba again and plan on converting my company away from ba flight a well be warned stay away from this carrier at all cost or be prepared to deal with zero customer service in case any issue arise

not verified we have had some torrid experience with ba which we have not been shy to report so when we flew yesterday with them from heathrow to austin and had a great flight in every way it felt right to feedback on that the staff in the upstairs business class cabin were frankly wonderful cheerful efficient and calm what more could you ask the food wa pretty nice and the champagne lovely the bed were very comfortable and sleeping wa easy i literally can not think of any real negative the luggage locker were quite small but then it an older model of the plane so that probably explains it if only ba could deliver this kind of experience on every occasion they would once again be the world favourite airline sadly the current ceo doesnt seem able to inspire and motivate his staff to be consistently delightful perhaps once he move on we can expect something better although the flight wa a bit delayed on departure it arrives bang on time a we entered the literally empty immigration area we were met by the most charming custom officer you can imagine who ended up giving u tourist tip and idea for bar surreal a anyone who regularly travel to the state will testify it felt a if we were living in the truman show at one point but in the nicest possible way get yourselves down to good ole austin now that ba fly there direct fantastic

trip verified the start of our journey back from from efl wa inauspicious with hundred of delayed and stranded passenger crammed into the departure lounge awaiting flight on airline other than ba a it wa weather in the uk plus air traffic control issue meant that departure wa delayed by 90 minute once airborne in a refitted a320 complete with a nice fresh leather smell cabin crew in ce were friendly and efficient and the food including a cod dish wa quite reasonable it wa interesting to note that the refit hadnt extended to the toilet which wa looking distinctly worse for the wear a big plus on the flight and a first for me wa wifi which actually worked and wa quite fast although at a cost of 499 for an hour use i thought it wa meant to be free for business class passenger but evidently not landing made up for some time but we were parked right in the middle of nowhere because of a backlog of flight however ba had laid on a separate bus for ce passenger and we were out of the airport 30 minute later so not too bad all in all

trip verified having booked this flight a week before the ba strike and mistakingly thinking that the strike would have ended two day before i flew and not in fact the day before i wa apprehensive a to how it would operate the checkin and security clearance at t5 took only 15 minute personally i do not like the self service bag and tag drop that ba operate a one is not 100 confident that i did everything correctly boarding is by the new fare group system 1 to 5 which depends on how much one ha paid for the ticket again im not a fan of this possibly due to the previous day strike and the need to accommodate passenger from canceled flight the aircraft wa a large a321 boarding wa however smooth on board the virtually full cabin wa very clean and the eurotraveller seat were comfortable and offer sufficient leg room im 1m79cm and my knee do not touch the seat in front the departure wa only 15 minute behind the scheduled departure time in flight there were 3 cabin staff in the euro traveller cabin believe 2 in club cabin who were very efficient and friendly and so one only had to wait no more than 30 minute from take off to purchase refreshment on such a full flight again it is a shame though that ba have gone down the no frill line and charge for food and drink when they describe themselves a a full service airline the landing at tegel wa 30 minute ahead of schedule all in all it wa a pleasant flight and the value wa very good a it wa combined with a hotel booking tegel itself is a bit of hassle with only 2 border police carrying out immigration control for over 200 passenger at the end of the airbridge and a further 30 minute wait for luggage but this wa not ba fault

not verified london to kefalonia the t5 gallery lounge is showing it age and wa packed at 930 on a saturday boarding wa by the now standard group which meant waiting 15 minute in a queue and then 10 minute on the bridge the flight deck then informed u that wed be waiting on a stand for 1 hr 20 minute before our departure slot once in the air cabin crew delivered the usual club europe experience which wa mediocre at best fortunately arrival wa only 45 minute late and we were out of kefalonia airport 30 minute later overall a typical ba experience thats lacklustre at best

trip verified london to dublin it wa never my choice to fly with british airway and i will never fly with them again i wa supposed to fly with american airline from the usa to dublin but i had a connecting flight from my origin city to chicago unfortunately my first flight wa delayed due to weather which caused me to miss the flight from chicago to dublin i wa put on a flight to london instead which i had to run for when i finally made it to chicago and my bag did not make it on the flight i then flew with british airway from london to dublin i wa told to file a lost baggage claim with ba which i did i wa told that the bag would be transferred from american to ba when it arrived in dublin using american baggage tracking system i wa able to confirm that the bag arrived the day after i did around noon on saturday i am writing this review on the following sunday and the bag is still not in my possession ba customer service is terrible if someone there tell me one more time to just wait and be patient i am going to lose it my bag ha been sitting at the airport in the same city im in for more than a day and i cant get it talk about serious frustration i dont know which airline is at fault for the delay but the difference is that when i called american the rep did everything she could to find out the status of my bag and even though their baggage claim desk wa closed when i called she still tried to call an internal number to see if anyone wa still around unfortunately she couldnt get hold of anyone but she left them a message and told me exactly who i could call and when to call them the next morning i did not receive that level of service from ba i even asked if they could call the airport and wa told we are not authorized to call airport why in the world wouldnt they be authorized to call their own baggage department i am not thrilled with either airline but at least american ha made some attempt to help me this ha ruined the first three day of a trip that i planned for two year if you do check a bag and it lost or delayed dont expect any help if you flew with ba and here a tip if you are dealing with a lost or delayed bag in a country you dont live in dont call the generic customer service number on the website you would normally use dig around and see if you can find a number for the airport you flew into you will get a lot more information and assistance that way

trip verified hong kong to london an email on the 25th august advising u that this flight wa cancelled and the hour spent on hold never speaking to anyone what a total awful nightmare then the email at 600pm saying i must be delighted to find out my flight ha not been cancelled all slot in the elemi salon were already booked so no massage were available in first class arriving at hk airport on the return journey and struggling even to get from the pavement to the inside of the terminal why did they not tell u to print out proof of travel we had to wait age for ba to open a check in desk pretty average food and service in the qantas lounge a broken screen in seat 59a it would not stay in position and without wedging unusable to constant interruption during the flight to my partner from a large passenger climbing over him a ghastly sweet and sour chicken main course which made me send my tray away and not eat until after leaving the flight cheapest goody bag with the broken zip and my suitcase wa the very last off the plane i had already been to the ba desk and reported it when it then eventually turned up on the conveyor belt first class out to hk wa a good business class experience the return flight in business class wa in a word poor the plane wa tired ife faulty poor food and the journey wa only saved by the quality of the staff they were lovely but if you give them rubbish tool they will serve rubbish the night term pantry offering wa a total joke i have been a ba exec card holder since for ever and i have seen is a decline in the service level certainly not value for money we did not get a club class experience on the flight home

trip verified london to abujaflight full aircraft an older version of 777200 evening meal served which wa very ordinary but we arrived more or le on time after dodging thunderstorm near abuja return flight delayed pilot strike meant our aircraft had been parked at lagos and had to be flown back to abuja with a 2 hour delay flight wa supposed to be a 8 am departure but the airport side did not have the sense to tell u so we were herded into the gate area where there wa no food facility and waited for the flight the crew were also herded into the gate area and it wa the same crew we had on the outward flight and the same plane they had also had to have a long foodless wait but were quite chatty a we were all in the same boat flight totally full a flight on previous day had been cancelled breakfast wa served but there wa no evidence of the standard of meal being improvedscrambled egg wa just a lump of tasteless yellow full credit to the crew cheerful and efficient in spite of all the delay etc the aircraft wa clean but old and down at heel the carpet under the seat in front wa ripped and the floor wa visible

trip verified london to bangkok what an awful plane seat are just about ok going coming back it seemed like a bar going across the bottom back part of the seat really uncomfortable the meal are fine but ala the last meal is served just over an hour before landing and rushed the main problem is the entertainment on a small scratched screen and about 15 film rubbish took 2 hour to get the screen to actually work the plane look old and tired not a pleasure to travel on this plane

trip verified belfast to san francisco via london checkin at belfast city wa fast and trouble free and security wa completed within just a few minute with no queue to mention boarding wa direct from the business lounge and on time a wa departure a full breakfast service wa carried out including hot towel hot breakfast tea and coffee along with drink from the bar on request the gallery lounge in terminal 5 at heathrow wa very busy with limited seat available boarding for the second flight began on time and departure swift the inflight service wa top notch with a very capable crew looking after the customer on the upper deck in a professional and discrete manner food wa plentiful and tasty entertainment perfectly adequate and seat comfort fine no complaint at all about the flight and would recommend british airway

trip verified london to gothenburg ba are getting a lot of bad press deservedly so at present with strike it glitch baggage problem however extreme case will always be highlighted two recent flight on ba and very happy with them flight to gothenburg on a319100 pushed back 25m late due to a potential technical issue soon resolved and arrived at got only 15m behind schedule good crew and the safety announcement video wa a hoot return to lhr on a320232 on time departure and early arrival at t5 again good crew will be flying with ba again in december strike permitting still recommended by me a the national carrier

trip verified mahe to stockholm via london checked in online before the flight but had to do the bag drop wa met by a rude lady at first class check in and the process took about 20 minute dont know why no apology the boarding wa in time the welcome wasnt especially friendly just pointing the direction where to go the club europe cabin felt claustrophobic i had a window seat the csm never came to say hello the service wa pretty basic ok during the meal but self service between no drink service if you didnt ask on the flight to stockholm the purser introduced himself to all emerald member the service wa limited due to the strike next day but friendly the seating wa terrible on this a320 so tight

trip verified glasgow to tampa via gatwick early morning flight glasgow to gatwick flight dud take off at 645 boarded with door closed by 630 bug did not depart till 710 due to gatwick being busy smooth flight down gatwick to tampa according to manage my booking aircraft changed 2 day prior to departure at boarding wa told our world traveller plus seat had been upgraded to club world a very pleasant surprise if wa on 777 which had not been refurbished extra space wa very good staff were very efficient and pleasant only downside wa the main meal which i would have had in original seat but main course were not to my liking but afternoon tea wa very good so thank you ba for the experience

not verified orlando to gatwick travelling home wa extremely disappointing the aircraft wa dirty drink stain on the side of the cabin and the remains of chewing gum on the seatbelt the aircraft aisle wa so narrow you had to walk sideways to prevent bumping into other passenger the aircraft had a broken toilet and light that could not be turned off so for a night flight part of the cabin wa illuminated which made sleep difficult the breakfast wa a garlic cream cheese croissant which tasted revolting and a highly processed cereal bar only one drink run wa made the standard on ba have plummeted since we last flew them seven year ago such a shame i hope management are looking at review such a this to improve service

trip verified london to abu dhabi this is the daytime flight from london a very good flight the food wa excellent for economy particularly in view of etihads disastrous change in food service the childrens meal were excellent the entertainment system wa great with a good selection it make a big difference having the entertainment system on when you board and not turn it off until the plane ha reached the gate especially when flying with child etihad why dont you do this the cabin crew were good economy in the 787 is cramped but probably no worse than many good value flight especially a the only other carrier to abu dhabi is etihad

trip verified london to st petersburgh huge disappointment for ba business class service in european route seat pitch ha been reduced to 30 over the last year from 34 at the expense of passenger comfort seat width is the same a economy with empty middle seat food for me wa halfempty plate representing a deli experience and leaving me hungry out of the three option offered two were already out of stock so stranded with the least favourable and most unhealthy food option avoid club europe not worth the money

trip verified sydney to london via singapore with british airway i made the mistake of ordering vegetarian meal on this flight the food wa horrendous i wa served an indistinguishable uniform mass of what appeared to be mashed overcooked potato and maybe other vegetable i am not sure for one meal and an ice cold frittatasandwich which should clearly have been heated up the latter i took one bite and couldnt continue i have had better meal in economy class in other airline the seat wa nothing to write home about but noticeably comfortable compared to economy class with the price difference to match of course the service wa lacking and quite perfunctory when it is available on the plus side i am glad there are shared toilet between business and premium economy class at the front of the cabin instead of having to walk all the way to the back of the plane like some other flight paid for inflight wifi for an a hour disconnected after 40 minute and no longer able to use reasonable price and speed

not verified london to johannesburg british airway is one of the few commercial carrier in the world that charge an exorbitant amount in fee when booking travel but in addition if you want to ensure you and your spouse will sit together on the flight you need to pay a high price to secure seat assignment with that said in 2018 my wife and i made reservation on ba to fly to johannesburg from london for an african adventure this october specifically 1031 yes thats the day called for brexit only we made our reservation before those date were set considering ba pilot have called for three pilot strike on september 2019 coupled with brexit we decided to change our flight plan because we did not want to risk missing our connection the good news is close to 800 in fee for our two business class ticket wa refunded when i changed our flight to another carrier through american airline advantage the bad news is the 22000 we had to pay to reserve our seat wa not refunded i called ba to request a refund and the agent and a supervisor told me their policy is to not refund seat reservation expense i wa just not feeling the love here so i am writing this missive to warn anyone traveling abroad to not fly british airway all of the other outstanding carrier dont charge nearly the high fee and most dont charge for reserving your seat in advance instead of ba we changed our booking to 1030 on etihad airway through abu dhabi their customer service wa outstanding the fee were lower and yes no charge to have the peace of mind that my wife and i can travel next to each other i am entering travel in september 2019 because there wa no other option for future travel this request for a refund come two month in advance of our planned flight this is an airline policy review and let the buyer beware

trip verified i have to say travelling in club europe is a waste of money the food wa no better than economy food from the past the seat are just the same a in economy although you get a middle tray and probably worst of all the cabin wa full of a lot of arrogant people who thought that just because they were not in economy it somehow made them more worthy people this might be a british trait a ive travelled business class on other airline and not had the same experience

not verified i had a stress free journey with my 8 yr old autistic son and 6 yr old girl from chennai to london by british airway the chennai ground service manager recogonised my sunflower lanyard and came forward to help me throughout the service right from pushing my trolley screening the luggage checking through the security without much stress and finally boarding the aircraft a the second person i am stunned by the service and am so glad to know that they recognise and respect and help u for the hidden disability and for making our journey really really smooth thank you so much inside the aircraft the crew member did come forward and asked if i need any help and another member did congratulate me for wearing the lanyard a the first person for him to see me with lanyard i did even use the disabled way to clear my immigration at heathrow airport over all i am happy to say that my trip with my kid ha been really smooth with ba and heathrow airport happyautism thank you

trip verified i purchased a ticket for dublin to mauritius on british airway for 23 feb 2019 on the day of travel a few hour before the departure time i realized that i would not be able to make it and so i got in touch with british airway on twitter advising them of my cancellation when i arrived home i asked them to officially cancel my ticket and issue me a refund i understood that my ticket wa a nonrefundable one but it say on the ticket that surcharge tax and airport fee would be refundable which should have amounted to at least 250 euro however all the airline refunded me wa a pitiful 50 euro i have been trying to speak to british airway on twitter many time over the past few month and they never responded positively only insisting that they were doing the right thing and that their position would not change british airway is being dishonest and should be avoided

not verified i have often flown british airway and have considered them a good airline however their customer service ha fallen to such a level that i must say it is terrible if you have no problem this is a good airline if you have any problem you will not be able to get any help i recently flew to london from chicago they erroneously cancelled my seat although i had checked in over 5 hour before he flight they then downgraded my seat and put me on the plane they then lost my luggage for 15 day these thing happen but customer service wa impossible to use when you call you almost always get a message that say they are busy and the phone automatically hang up if you send in a request for help via the website you will get only a robo generated message that they will get back to you they do not you cant find out the status of your inquiry and only get a looping set of computer message do not take this airline if customer service may be important to you

not verified good morning i would like to write a review for british airway it took me a while to write this review a i it took me a while to get over what happened to me but i feel that the way british airway behaved need a review for their valiant effort last year i went with my 9 year old son and my 80 year old friend to new orleans from london on the holiday of a life time i wa pregnant at the time the baby died while i wa on holiday there and i wa in a turmoil of emotion regardless i tried to make the holiday a positive experience for my son and friend and carried on all the while just wanting to go home a treatment needed to take place in england somehow i missed the flight back i have no excuse for this when i realised i wa in a complete state i had a break down i rang ba and sobbed down the phone they were beyond amazing they arranged a flight back home the same day without any extra cost we all sat together and we were able to fly home that day and i wa in hospital the day afterwards customer service wa outstanding so compassionate and helpful and again they did not ask for a penny for our return flight i am beyond grateful for their help i will only ever fly ba on long haul if possible
